messages.content: Tell me a joke about red chairs in Wyoming, suitable for an audience of pipefitters
Why did the red chair go to Wyoming? To get a better seat!
Tell me a joke about drape runners and make sure to include emojis

Tell a humorous story about a shamrock shake machine

Once upon a time, there was a small town that was famous for its Shamrock Shakes. Every year, the town held a festival to celebrate the shakes, and everyone would come from miles around to sample the delicious treat. One year, a machine was invented that could make the shakes much faster than a human could. The town was overjoyed, and the festival was a roaring success. But the machine was so efficient that it put all the human shake makers out of business and the town was left with nothing but machines and shakes. To this day, the town holds a festival every year to celebrate the Shamrock Shake Machine! ğŸ¦ğŸ¤”ğŸ¤©
